[center][font size=4]Nzbmegasearch Change Log[/font][/center] [font size=4]11-11-2015[/font] -Initial Release
Container.Name: nzbmegasearch
Container.Description: Aggregate automatically NZB search results. Easy. Quick. Clean.[br]NZBmegasearcH collects all your (not only) newznab-based accounts to one place. It is your meta-search engine and your SB, CP unique NZB provider.[br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] Where nzbmegasearch should store settings, log and configuration files[br]
Container.Overview: Aggregate automatically NZB search results. Easy. Quick. Clean. NZBmegasearcH collects all your (not only) newznab-based accounts to one place. It is your meta-search engine and your SB, CP unique NZB provider.
